name: Astral Archive
technical: Integrated Knowledge Management and CRM system.
ceremonial: Celestial storage of knowledge: where every customer and information is preserved like a star.

name: Badge System
technical: Digital badges (NFTs/Metadata) for milestones.
ceremonial: System of honors: every success is a celebration, every upgrade a coronation.

name: Communal Map
technical: Shared visual map for networking and collaboration.
ceremonial: Shared map: where your journey joins with other travelers (businesses).

name: Data Well
technical: Local-first database that is exclusively yours.
ceremonial: Spring of Data: that pure place where your data is safe from external interference.

name: Encryption Pulse
technical: Permanent beat of End-to-End Encryption (E2EE).
ceremonial: Heartbeat of Encryption: the rhythm that keeps your privacy alive.

name: Finance Forge
technical: Alchemical processing of financial records and taxes.
ceremonial: Financial Furnace: where raw income is turned into the gold of profit.

name: Gateway
technical: Path for Digital Identity (DID) and Wallet.
ceremonial: Portal of Sovereignty: the threshold you cross to become a sovereign architect.

name: Heart of Lore
technical: Automation engine (ECA Logic) that turns work into story.
ceremonial: Heart of Legend: the engine that turns your daily hard work into an immortal tale.

name: Insight Instruments
technical: Data analytics and insight-providing tools.
ceremonial: Instruments of Insight: those telescopes that see future trends.

name: Journey Logs
technical: Operational history and audit trail.
ceremonial: Travelogue: the written history of your every step.

name: Knightly Tasks
technical: Honorable system for project and task management.
ceremonial: Royal Duties: those missions that complete your purpose.

name: Lore Engine
technical: System handling complex logic and workflow.
ceremonial: Engine of Legend: the magic that connects all things behind the scenes.

name: Milestone Manager
technical: Identification of milestones and goals.
ceremonial: Manager of Destinations: who reminds you where your next stop is.

name: Nexus Nodes
technical: Modular points for connecting with other software.
ceremonial: Nexus Nodes: places in the universe from where new paths open.

name: Orbiting Apps
technical: Ecosystem of 3rd party apps orbiting the system.
ceremonial: Orbiting Apps: those planets that are subject to your center.

name: Privacy Protocol
technical: Complete code of privacy and digital freedom.
ceremonial: Privacy Procedure: your strongest fortress of sovereignty.

name: Quest Board
technical: Display of daily priorities and operations.
ceremonial: Quest Board: where every morning new missions await you.

name: Relic Registry
technical: Register of assets and inventory.
ceremonial: Archeological Register: record of every valuable thing you possess.

name: Sovereign Link
technical: Secure and sovereign communication channels.
ceremonial: Sovereign Link: that coordination that connects you to the world with dignity.

name: Threshold of Trade
technical: Threshold for E-commerce store and transactions.
ceremonial: Threshold of Trade: from where your services reach the world.

name: Universal Vault
technical: Universal safe for files and documents.
ceremonial: Universal Vault: where your secrets and evidence are safe forever.

name: Visionary Dashboard
technical: Beautiful visual UI showing the entire system.
ceremonial: Visionary Dashboard: the true mirror of your empire.

name: Weaving Web
technical: Integrated supply chain and logistics system.
ceremonial: Weaving Web: the net that connects you to resources.

name: X-Factor
technical: Research, development, and innovative modules.
ceremonial: X-Factor: that unknown power that distinguishes you from others.

name: Yield Yard
technical: Yard for measuring ROI and production.
ceremonial: Yield Yard: where the fruit of your hard work grows.

name: Zenith
technical: Ultimate goal and peak of the business.
ceremonial: Point of Zenith: the place where your mission becomes a complete universe.
